lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins obtained center Carl Soderberg from the St. Louis Blues for goalie Hannu Toivonen yesterday.on Monday. Toivonen, who spent parts of the last two seasons with the Bruins, became expendable when Boston obtained goalie Manny Fernandez from Minnesota on June 30.
